metadata.title: CVE-2024-48916 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
Authentication bypass in CEPH RadosGW

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-48916` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ceph - 15.2.17-0ubuntu0.20.04.6
ceph-base - 15.2.17-0ubuntu0.20.04.6
ceph-common - 15.2.17-0ubuntu0.20.04.6

criterions.comment: ceph package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '15.2.17-0ubuntu0.20.04.6').
